exceptions.title: Errors might disappear silently
exceptions.summary: This is fixable ‚Äî we'll help you make errors visible.
exceptions.why: When errors are caught too broadly, bugs can hide instead of telling you what happened.

action.text: Add logging or re-raise the error so you can see what went wrong.

exceptions.footer: This is a small change that gives you a lot more peace of mind.
